did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: AFL-CIO Documents of Work and Labor Law Reform, 1993-1993

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: American Federation of Labor-Congress of Industrial Organizations (AFL-CIO)

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: "Report of the Staff Working Groups on Organizing and Collective Bargaining the AFL- CIO Committee on the Evolution of Work" May 18, 1993, and other selected Documents of Work and Labor Law Reform, 1993.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of "Report of the Staff Working Groups on Organizing and Collective Bargaining the AFL-CIO Committee on the Evolution of Work" May 18, 1993, and other selected Documents of Work and Labor Law Reform, 1993.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: AFL-CIO. Committee on the Evolution of Work

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
